title: Robert H. Davis Endowed Chair in Discovery Learning
description: To provide support for the Robert H. Davis Chair in Discovery Learning in the College of Engineering and Applied Science including salary, student support , research, conferences, curriculum development and other activities in support of the Chair.
marketingContent: To provide support for the Robert H. Davis Chair in Discovery Learning in the College of Engineering and Applied Science including salary, student support , research, conferences, curriculum development and other activities in support of the Chair.
